definition: a protective covering that keeps things out or hinders sight, examine methodically
details:
noun
- a protective covering that keeps things out or hinders sight
= synonyms: blind
- a protective covering consisting of netting
- a covering that serves to conceal or shelter something
= example: a covering that serves to conceal or shelter something
= synonyms: cover
- partition consisting of a decorative frame or panel that serves to divide a space
- the display that is electronically created on the surface of the large end of a cathode-ray tube
- a white or silvered surface where pictures can be projected for viewing
= synonyms: silver screen, projection screen
- a door that consists of a frame holding metallic or plastic netting
= synonyms: screen door
- a strainer for separating lumps from powdered material or grading particles
= synonyms: sieve
- the personnel of the film industry
= example: the personnel of the film industry
= synonyms: filmdom, screenland
verb
- examine methodically
= example: examine methodically
- protect, hide, or conceal from danger or harm
= synonyms: shield
- separate with a riddle, as grain from chaff
= synonyms: riddle
- prevent from entering
= synonyms: bar
- project onto a screen for viewing
= example: project onto a screen for viewing
- examine in order to test suitability
= example: examine in order to test suitability
= synonyms: sieve, sort, screen out
- test or examine for the presence of disease or infection
= example: test or examine for the presence of disease or infection
= synonyms: test
